TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Pizza will happen!

Guys, before you get overboard on this idea, remember that it's still 11:44AM in Mexico City at the moment

Plus Ted would miss out on it since he lives in Wales.

But that's an experimentals release, not a scratchpad one.

Scratchpad is for QA (according to the website) which is even pre-experimentals, so I'm not sure what that was about. It could have been a change for just their internal group to try. Or maybe they're using it to do the RC *shrugs*

Can only talk about germany, but here the standard usually is 26 cm (and large size pizzas AFAIK 30-32)

Poor Germans...
